location.name: County
location.doc: Represents a county within a country

props.name: name
props.doc: County name, with that county's or country's primary language

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who registered this county

location.name: PostalCode
location.doc: Represents a postal code, which represents an area within a county

props.name: number
props.doc: The number portion of this postal code
Id of the county where this postal code is resides

props.name: streetName
props.doc: Name of the street -portion of this address

props.name: buildingNumber
props.doc: Number of the targeted building within the specified street

props.name: stair
props.doc: Number or letter of the targeted stair within that building, if applicable

props.name: roomNumber
props.doc: Number of the targeted room within that stair / building, if applicable

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who registered this address

company.name: Company
company.doc: Represents a registered company (or an individual person)

props.name: yCode
props.doc: Official registration code of this company (id in the country system)

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who registered this company to this system
Time when this company was registered

company.name: CompanyDetails
company.doc: Contains company information which may change and on which there may be varying views

props.doc: Id of the company which this describes

props.name: name
props.doc: Name of this company

props.name: addressId
props.doc: Street address of this company's headquarters or operation

props.name: taxCode
props.doc: Tax-related identifier code for this company

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who wrote this description

props.name: isOfficial
props.doc: Whether this information is by the company which is being described, having a more authority

company.name: OrganizationCompany
company.doc: Connects organizations with their owned companies

props.doc: Id of the owner organization
Id of the owned company

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who created this link

company.name: Bank
company.doc: Represents a bank (used with bank addresses)

props.name: name
props.doc: (Short) name of this bank

props.name: bic
props.doc: BIC-code of this bank

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who registered this address

company.name: CompanyBankAccount
company.doc: Used for listing which bank accounts belong to which company

props.doc: Id of the company which owns this bank account
Id of the bank where the company owns an account

props.name: address
props.doc: The linked bank account address
Time when this information was registered

props.name: isOfficial
props.doc: Whether this bank account information was written by the company authorities

invoice.name: UnitCategory
invoice.doc: Represents different categories a unit can belong to. Units within a category can be compared.

invoice.name: ItemUnit
invoice.doc: Represents a unit in which items can be counted

props.name: categoryId
props.doc: Id of the category this unit belongs to

props.name: multiplier
props.doc: A multiplier that, when applied to this unit, makes it comparable with the other units in the same category

invoice.name: CompanyProduct
invoice.doc: Represents a type of product sold by an individual company

props.doc: Id of the company that owns this product type

props.name: unitId
props.doc: Id representing the units in which this product or service is sold

props.name: defaultUnitPrice
props.doc: Default € price per single unit of this product

props.name: taxModifier
props.doc: A modifier that is applied to this product's price to get the applied tax
Time when this product was registered

props.name: discontinuedAfter
props.doc: Time when this product was discontinued (no longer sold)

invoice.name: Invoice
invoice.doc: Represents a bill / an invoice sent by one company to another to request a monetary transfer / payment

props.name: senderCompanyId
props.doc: Id of the company who sent this invoice (payment recipient)

props.name: recipientCompanyDetailsId
props.doc: Id of the details of the recipient company used in this invoice

props.name: senderBankAccountId
props.doc: Id of the bank account the invoice sender wants the recipient to transfer money to
Id of the language used in this invoice

props.name: referenceCode
props.doc: A custom reference code used by the sender to identify this invoice

props.name: paymentDuration
props.doc: Number of days during which this invoice can be paid before additional consequences

props.name: productDeliveryDate
props.doc: Date when the sold products were delivered, if applicable

props.name: creatorId
props.doc: Id of the user who created this invoice

invoice.name: InvoiceItem
invoice.doc: Represents an individual sold item or service

props.doc: Id of the invoice on which this item appears

props.name: productId
props.doc: Id of the type of product this item represents / is

props.name: description
props.doc: Name or description of this item (in the same language the invoice is given in)

props.name: pricePerUnit
props.doc: Euro (€) price per each sold unit of this item, without taxes applied

props.name: unitsSold
props.doc: Amount of items sold in the product's unit
